tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LandCoverChangeAnalysis (
  pixel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  land_cover_type VARCHAR,
  change_date DATE,
  change_reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE land_cover_change (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  location VARCHAR,
  previous_land_type VARCHAR,
  updated_land_type VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE land_cover_data (
   id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   area_name TEXT,
   land_cover_type TEXT,
   change_type TEXT,
   change_date DATE
);
